name: Shock Stun Friends Joke
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Shock Stun.
Shock Stun Friends Joke - a joke simulation game where you can hit the other in the current joke! You want to play a friend? Like beautiful and powerful stun? Do you want to afford such, but you are not allowed? Use our secure laser!
Play with your friends, and do not be afraid to hurt! There are different shockers to choose from!
Listen to the sounds and see the animation! Turn shocker at an unexpected time and not the usual place, and you are surprised by the results!
Choose your own on what side you're on good or evil! Raffle friends let them think that you have a real stun gun!
Game shock stun the only simulator that is made as a joke and will not harm your health!
Thank you for choosing our game! Leave feedback for the games and we will make them even better!
